column4: would someone be able to help me with my clock?  I have ntp and ntpdate installed, and I have servers selected, and it's set to synchronize with internet servers...but I can't click the "synchronize now" button (it's greyed out), and it's definitely not displaying the right time, even after I've restarted. Any ideas?
you can only click that button when you have set the time for "manual"
set it to manual and hit the button!
also, ntp is unable to adjust for large time differences. try setting to something more correct
